author: {'steamid': '76561198399550977', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 425, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 425, 'last_played': 1704630228}
review:
反差萌最棒了!!
這一次的主角是紅豆與椰子這對凹凸組合。
姊妹中身材最小巧卻又有著靈敏的思維與靈巧手藝的長女紅豆。
姊妹中身材最成熟卻又有點天然又笨手笨腳的第二小妹妹椰子。
這對姊妹雖然對比鮮明，但是說到對對方著想的心意卻又不相上下。
故事中儘管常常爭吵，旦絕不會真的討厭對方的地方也令人看得嘴角上揚。
兩人在故事中向主角"撒嬌"的樣子也可愛的讓人移不開視線。
這一作中新增了摸摸系統，所有貓娘+妹妹都可以摸摸，
讓人盡情的享受了擼貓(?)的樂趣。
第三作要輪到中間的姐妹了，這個瑟瑟與正經的組合又會帶給我們怎樣的心動呢?

author: {'steamid': '76561198345760148', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 634, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 608, 'last_played': 1703969960}
review:
NEKOPARA Vol. 2 - это визуальный роман, продолжающий историю Кашоу Минадуки и его кошечек-помощниц. В этой части он углубляется в отношения с двумя из них - Коконат и Азуки, которые испытывают сложные чувства друг к другу и к своему хозяину. Игра предлагает красивую графику, анимацию и озвучку, а также много юмора и сладости. Однако, она также имеет некоторые недостатки, такие как отсутствие выбора, цензура и повторение сюжетных мотивов.

Графика и анимация игры на высоком уровне. Персонажи выглядят очень мило и выразительно, а фоны детализированы и атмосферны. Анимация персонажей делает их еще более живыми и реалистичными, а также добавляет динамики в сцены. Озвучка персонажей также на высоте. Голоса подходят к характерам и эмоциям кошечек, а также к ситуациям, в которых они оказываются. Музыкальное сопровождение игры приятное и разнообразное, хотя и не особо запоминающееся.

Сюжет игры достаточно простой и легкий. Он фокусируется на развитии отношений между Кашоу, Коконат и Азуки, а также на их повседневной жизни в кондитерской La Soleil. Игра имеет много комедийных и романтических моментов, а также немного драмы и конфликтов. Однако, игра также повторяет некоторые сюжетные мотивы из первой части, такие как проблемы с самооценкой и ревность кошечек. Кроме того, игра не дает игроку никакого выбора или влияния на сюжет, что может снизить интерес к повторному прохождению.

Еще одним недостатком игры является цензура. Игра содержит несколько эротических сцен, которые затемняются в версии для Steam. Для того, чтобы увидеть их полностью, нужно купить отдельный патч или модифицировать игру. Это может быть разочарованием для тех, кто хочет насладиться всеми аспектами игры. (Боже правый)

В целом, NEKOPARA Vol. 2 - это хорошая игра для любителей визуальных романов и кошечек. Она имеет отличную графику, анимацию и озвучку, а также много юмора и сладости. Однако, она также имеет некоторые недостатки, такие как отсутствие выбора, цензура и повторение сюжетных мотивов. Я бы рекомендовал эту игру тем, кто понравилась первая часть, а также тем, кто ищет легкую и милую историю про кошечек.

author: {'steamid': '76561198090513887', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 435, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 435, 'last_played': 1460239655}
review:
Vanilla isn't just the name of a cat, but a perfect way to describe this game, and there's nothing wrong with that. If you enjoy a story about a guy running a bakery and interacting with various cat girls in a variety of ways, this title is right up your alley. If you're looking for something more, you'd best steer clear of this one. This is a textbook example of playing it safe, so you won't find anything here, aside from some cute dialog with some decent art direction in general and in the H-scenes.

That being said, it came out at a time where the western audience wasn't that familiar with this type of content, so it's been overhyped as a result of it. It isn't good, it isn't bad. It's just... vanilla.

review:
I wish there was a neutral choice for this game so, instead, I'll follow suit for all the people that up-voted.

I can neither recommend for or against this game since it is one meant to target a specific audience. It would be a lie to say that I spent time actually paying attention to the game. The Plot or anything of that sense. I can confirm that the game will not crash if you hold Ctrl [Or was it alt?] to skip dialog too fast.

I can also confirm that I don't know what the hell I was thinking when I bought every game in this series....

author: {'steamid': '76561198125580541', 'num_games_owned': 1206, 'num_reviews': 2050, 'playtime_forever': 6017, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6008, 'last_played': 1699731672}
review:
[h1] NEKOPARA - Часть 2  [/h1]
После 100 часов наблюдение за кошко-девочками, я начал понимать в чём смысл жизни. Теперь я подписался на Илона Маска, и начал копить деньги на свою собственную кошко-девочку. Может мы с ней тоже создадим своё кафе, и у нас будет свои котятки. Так-что с нетерпением ожидаю дальнейших разработок Маска, и  с нетерпением буду ждать результатов по создании кошко-девочек! Но главное чтоб Китайский партия не узнал куда я вкладываю свои юани, и не отобрал у меня миску риса и кошко-жену. 

[h2] Сюжет [/h2]
Ну и развращение кошачьей семьи проходит по плану, и тут мы уже будем подкатывать не только к двум лоляхам, но и к сисястым милфам. Сюжет тут остался прежний, и мы продолжаем чилить в кафе с кошко-девочками. История продолжает быть душевной, милой, и доброй. Но если вы играете без патча 18+, то 80% сюжета просто потеряет смысл! Ибо без секс-сцен, ты просто не испытываешь тех чувств и эмоций, которые чувствует главный герой и его неко-девочки. Так-что без патча 18+, и эту игру нету смысла играть! 

[h2] Визуал [/h2]
Визуал в игре так-же как и в первой части очень шикарен, и подобный стиль рисовки мне нравиться! Игру склепали в 2016-ом году, и как для 2016-ого года, рисовка тут очень качественная. В отличие от первой части, тут присутствует уже намного больше персонажей. Так-что уровень милоты тут просто зашкаливает! А из-за того что персонажей стало больше, игра стала прям живая:) Ну и как в первой части, видно что над созданием артов очень старались. 

[h2] Секс-сцены [/h2]
Секс-сцены тут качественные, и все девушки выглядят очень сексуально! Но чтоб получить контент 18+, нужно купить DLC18+! Контента 18+ в игре не так много, но зато DLC18+ стоит как сама игра. Да и помимо этого, контент 18+ очень сильно портит цензура. Но если вы хотите посмотреть на миленьких кошко-девочек, то однозначно стоит покупать доп. контент!) Если в первой части был контент с лоли-кошками, то теперь контент стал разнообразнее, и разраб добавил кошечек с буферами!)))) А так-как разраб крыса, то все скрины 18+ уже сразу цензурятся. И они цензурятся настолько плотно, что весь экран у вас будет в цензуре. Так-что если вы захотите поделиться в стиме скрином с другом, то у вас нечего не выйдет! 

[h2] Анимация [/h2]
В этой игре присутствует очень шикарная анимация, которая делает игру живой. Мне всегда больше нравились новеллы с анимацией, потому-что они всегда выглядели привлекательнее. Девушки тут двигаются даже во время диалогов, и мне такое очень нравиться. Девушки могу двигаться, моргать, и могут шевелить не только ушками, но даже хвостиком! Анимация в игре плавная, и девушки двигаются очень реалистично. 

Из плюсов:
+Сексуальные кошко-девочки 
+Есть хентай с лолями
*Мечта педофила 
+Добавили кошко-девочек с сиськами 
+Очень качественная графика 
+Приятная рисовка 
+Качественная анимация 
+Чиловый сюжет 
+Интересные диалоги 
+Качественная озвучка 

Из минусов:
-Платное DLC 18+ 
-Нету Русского 

Игра мне очень понравилась, и каждое прочтение было очень интересным! Игру однозначно рекомендую к покупке! Но лучше дождаться на неё и патч18+ скидочки 50%, и только тогда покупать!)))) А если вам понравился мой обзор, не забывайте ставить лайки или кидать награды(*^ω^) А так-же, вы можете подписаться на мой YouTube канал (ссылка в профиле).

author: {'steamid': '76561199088127354', 'num_games_owned': 50, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 102, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 102, 'last_played': 1637034299}
review:
[h1] 猫娘乐园 第二部 [/h1]
[b] NEKOPARA Vol. 2 [/b]
[i] BB一下：最好是在这个下面买R18，也别找破解了，支持一下NEKO WORKs吧！ [/i]
这部作品虽然是写的第二部，但是确实猫娘乐园的第三篇作品，这部作品上架时间是2016/02/20

在这个第二部作品，在有香草和巧克力的条件之下，继续能够吃下两只猫娘，本次猫娘名字叫做红豆和椰子
红豆，作为家里面最年长的猫娘，但是升高确实家里面最矮的一位猫娘
椰子，是家里没进入巧克力和香草的时候，成为家里最年轻的一位猫娘，但是升高却是最高的一位猫娘
虽然两对是从小照顾的一个关系，但是随着她们成长反而是每日一小吵，三天一大吵的欢喜冤家
在这个剧情里面，嘉祥以他自己的能力来解除她们两个之间的隔阂，成功成为情人，然后带领继续开着店铺
准确来说他依然没有离开过背景剧情，只是增加了一对情侣而已哈哈哈哈哈
还是很甜的说实话，不用担心~

这里就多提一嘴，在中间有一个剧情，是椰子救了一直非常弱小的猫娘（对比巧克力和香草还小的猫娘），叫做牛奶，虽然这只是一个添加的猫娘，但是她也是好可爱的呜呜呜

那么，在最后
[h1] 猫娘乐园 第二部 [/h1]
[b] NEKOPARA Vol. 2 [/b]
依然是非常好的游戏，希望之后能够继续推出更好的作品
NEKO WORKs

review:

“人各有好，雅俗共赏。” 欢迎各位关注“[url=store.steampowered.com/curator/44399757/] 俗人品茶·鉴赏家 [/url]”或者加入“[url=steamcommunity.com/groups/teaandfun] 俗人品茶·群组 [/url]”。

[h1] 测评正文(完整版) [/h1]
[h2] 前言 [/h2]
巧克力+香草+椰子+红豆=甜蜜人生，
猫耳娘+双飞+百合贴贴=无敌！

[h2] 游戏简介 [/h2]
《NEKOPARA Vol. 2》是一部短篇视觉小说，讲述了男主和六位猫耳娘一起开蛋糕店的故事。

[h2] 成人内容评分[7/10] [/h2]
- 成人内容的数量和种类
CG列表包括37张静态CG、开场动画(op)、结束动画(ED)、6张动态CG，实际上只有3个H事件。
- 成人CG的具体描述
静态CG和静态CG混合，有码，有文字和图片差分，有日语配音。
- 好不好用？
这个因人而异，我弟弟表示还不错。本作延续了第一部的剧情，把两个新的猫娘收入后宫，合计四个。
猫耳娘+双飞+百合贴贴，弟弟完全不是对手。
私密部位有马赛克，对游戏体验造成了一定影响。

[h2] 游戏性评分[5/10] [/h2]
1. 本作是纯粹的视觉小说，全程没有选项，可玩性较低。
2. 主要的女性角色有日语配音和动态人物立绘，有简单的表情和动作变化。
3. 背景音乐多样，曲调欢乐，旋律轻快，和纯爱的主题很搭。

[h2] 剧情评分[7/10] [/h2]
1. 主线清晰，剧情简短，故事甜蜜有爱。
2. 只有一条剧情线，没有选项，没有多结局。
3. 翻译质量不错，女性角色有日语配音，对话框支持双语同时显示，有需要的玩家可以听日语看中文学英语。

[h2] 综合评分[7/10] [/h2]
《NEKOPARA Vol. 2》成人内容质量高数量少，故事甜蜜有爱，可玩性不高，个人推荐打折购买。
（NEKOPARA系列1-3部剧情一路相承，各方面表现类似，导致我的各项评分也差不多，因此三篇测评内容大体相似，只有部分细节调整。）

[h2] 购买须知 [/h2]
1. 游戏本体没有成人内容，需要购买付费DLC。个人推荐港区的玩家购买，不推荐国区的玩家购买。
2. 在商店页面找到DLC [NEKOPARA Vol. 2 - 18+ Adult Only Content]，购买后会自动安装。如果DLC没有自动和游戏本体一起安装，请在商店页面找到DLC，点击“添加到库”即可。
3. 据可靠消息称，NEKOPARA系列目前在steam发行了6部作品，基本情况如下：
- [NEKOPARA Vol. 0] 前传，没有色色。
- [NEKOPARA Vol. 1] 本篇第一部，通过付费DLC解锁成人内容。
- [NEKOPARA Vol. 2] 本篇第二部，通过付费DLC解锁成人内容。
- [NEKOPARA Vol. 3] 本篇第三部，通过付费DLC解锁成人内容。
- [NEKOPARA Vol. 4] 本篇第四部。steam没有成人DLC，发行商网站有付费下载。
- [NEKOPARA Extra] 前传，没有色色。

[h2] 关于马赛克的讨论 [/h2]
部分中国玩家对马赛克过敏。国内没有对文化作品进行分级，遇到敏感内容直接一刀切。各大平台委曲求全，打码、切割画面或者下架作品，都是常见操作。这些行为会刺激观众的心理，让他们觉得自己受到了不公平的待遇，以至于出现“正版受害者”之类的说法。
我对比过某些小说和视频删减前后的区别，确实有或多或少的影响。打个比方，那些被删减掉的内容就像一道菜里的调味料。如果酸甜排骨不酸了，吃起来容易发腻。如果青椒炒肉不放盐，可能就没法吃了。
打码或许没有删减内容那么粗暴，但是一样会对玩家的游戏体验造成影响。
以下列出我反对打码的三个理由：
1. 马赛克污染画面，破坏画面的协调。
2. 人体的器官并不丑陋，尊重自己和别人的身体是基本的素养。
3. 从我个人的游戏经验来看，对于纯爱或者后宫题材的游戏，马赛克影响不大；对于恶堕或者调教题材的游戏，马赛克会直接破坏玩家的游戏体验。当你的游戏质量不够高，打码就会成为玩家打差评的理由之一。
言尽于此，我以一个普通玩家的身份，奉劝各位开发商和发行商不要打码。

[h2] 欢迎关注steam鉴赏家 [/h2]
“[url=store.steampowered.com/curator/44399757/] 俗人品茶·鉴赏家 [/url]”以自身的游戏体验为中心，从游戏可玩性、剧情、美术和性价比等方面进行客观分析，致力于给玩家提供有价值、有温度的评论。鉴于组员的个人爱好，目前主要评测的游戏类型有：1.成人游戏。2.策略游戏。3.卡牌游戏。4.视觉小说。

author: {'steamid': '76561198415781696', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 494, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 494, 'last_played': 1636269297}
review: Despite being one man, the developer of this game really knows what his fans want. On Friday, I had burned my hand with flaming oil and stayed eight straight hours in a neglectful "healthcare" facility that took eight hours to bandage my recently singed flesh. This left me with very limited use of my left hand, thus rendering me unable to play most games as they tend to require two hands. This hero of a developer kept his clientele in mind, and made it so this game could easily be played with one hand. I can tell just by that design choice that this is an upstanding Christian man who had developed a wholesome Christian game. Obviously this game was designed for people with limited mobility such as myself, as I cannot think of any other reason why this game should be played with one hand. These design choices lead me to believe that there is still hope left for humanity, 10/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561199229405622', 'num_games_owned': 165, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 957, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 957, 'last_played': 1697963803}
review:
[h3]購入価格（2022/03/31）[/h3]
割引後：353円　[strike]割引前：980円[/strike]

[h1]すぐ分かる概要[/h1]
[list]
[*]分岐無しのビジュアルノベル。
[*]最低でも、同シリーズのVol.1は事前プレー推奨。
[*]次作も気になりつつ、しっかりまとまっている良作。
[/list]


[h3]感想[/h3]

[b][u]おすすめする理由[/u][/b]

　本作はタイトルにVol.2とあるように『[b][url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/333600/]NEKOPARA Vol. 1[/url][/b]』のプレーが前提の内容でした。（※本作はリリース順で第3弾です。）そのため、Vol.1を読了した方に向けてのレビューとなります。
　なお、同シリーズの私のレビューは最下部にリンクを設けているため、そちらをご利用いただければ幸いです。

　作品の概要にもある通り、長女のアズキと四女のココナツが中心となって、ストーリーが進行します。
　Vol.1で中心であった、ショコラとバニラのファンの方もご心配なく。彼女らの出番も活躍も十二分にあり、違った魅力を見付けられること間違いなしです。

　Vol.1を読んで良かったと感じたなら、一読の価値有りです。（もっとも、Vol.2から購入される方は稀有でしょうけれど。）


[b][u]ゲームの特徴[/u][/b]

　レビューの概要に書いた通り、分岐なしのビジュアルノベルです。

　相変わらずUIがしっかりしており、取り立てて本作から語る『特徴』はありません。前作や前々作と同様、2つの言語を並べて読むことも可能です。


[b][u]気が付いたこと等[/u][/b]

　これは決して [b]不満ではない[/b] のですが、各キャラクターにフォーカスしすぎて、パティスリーである必要性がやや薄れている気がしないでもないです。

　本シリーズを「洋菓子店が舞台であるから」という理由で気になった方は、そこに期待しすぎると外れるかもしれません。私は該当しなかったので、全く問題ありませんでした。


[h3]余談[/h3]

[b][u]同シリーズレビューリンク（最終更新日：2024/02/13）[/u][/b]

　第1弾：[b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/darekanonym/recommended/333600/]NEKOPARA Vol. 1[/url][/b]
　第2弾：[b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/darekanonym/recommended/385800/]NEKOPARA Vol. 0[/url][/b]
　第3弾：NEKOPARA Vol. 2　※このレビューです。
　第4弾：[b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/darekanonym/recommended/602520/]NEKOPARA Vol. 3[/url][/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561199213743706', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 3576, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3576, 'last_played': 1697769092}
review:
Two more to the collection...

[h1] Introduction [/h1]

Nekopara Vol.2 is the sequel to the Vol.1, developed by NEKO WORKs, and it's pretty much of the same, but with some twists. So, lets take a deeper look into this game.

[h1] Worldbuilding [/h1]

The worldbuilding remained essentially the same, save for some small additions. This time, though, the new elements were introduced through organic dialogue instead of lenghty exposition dumps, which is an improvement over the first game. It's not surprising, though, because there isn't much to introduce at this point, because the first game took care of most of the worldbuilding elements in the nekoverse.

[h1] The plot [/h1]

As a slice-of-life story, there isn't much to mention here, but I noticed a shift on the narrative focus of the story. It went from a pastry chef who wanted to start his own business to a pastry chef who started building his own harem (we all knew where this would go anyways). This time, there weren't any plotholes or contrivances to speak of, so, another improvement. The overall tone of the game remained consistent, and the tonal shifts felt organic and natural. The pacing was also good.

[h1] The characters [/h1]

This time, the game focuses on the characters of Coconut and Azuki. One thing I didn't mention in my review of Vol. 1 is that the catgirls, except Chocola and Vanilla, who are from mixed breeds, are based on a specific kind of breed, Coconut being a Maine Coon (which would explain her physique, because Maine Coons are huge), and Azuki being a Munchkin (which would explain her petite frame). Honestly, given the precedent, I didn't expect characters undergoing character arcs, but, surprisingly, there are. Coconut's character arc was setup in the first game (notice that in Extra, she called Kashou "onii-chan" but in Vol.1 she called him "Kashou-sama", which at first, indicated maturity, which, as I saw, wasn't the case). She realized (not without powerful and endearing drama) that she was pretending to be someone that she wasn't. Her core flaw was her impatience, because she wanted to become a capable adult catgirl as fast as possible, but she was able to embrace her true self and become happier because of it. I's a basic character arc, but it is consistent with her characterization and worked well. Azuki also did a bit of growing up, but not in the same level as Coconut. So far, in terms of character writing, Coconut is the best one. Azuki is a total tsundere, by the way, and Shigure's brother complex is somehow worse than in the first game.

[h1] Presentation [/h1]

There is nothing to add about art direction, sound design, character artstyle, animations, soundtrack, voice acting and H-scene quality, because they remained unchanged from the first game. The only difference I found is that now the game provides an option to pet the catgirls. They make really cute sounds when petted, and they look adorable. And not only you can pet the catgirls. You can also touch their boing-boing and caress their tummies, and they make from cute noises to lewd sounds, depending on where are you touching them.

In conclusion:

[b] Pros: [/b]

-Tiny but appreciated improvements across the board.
-It wouldn't be a catgirl game without the option of petting them.
-Coconut's character arc was satisfying.

[b] Cons: [/b]

-H-scenes are still at 30 fps.
-At 11 hours, is still a bit too short for the price.

This game saw some improvements over the first one, but there are some things that need improvement. That said, it's a good thing that this game remained consistent whether be in the story or in the presentation, and the characters are still endearing, which is a must in this type of stories. And the addition of a character arc, however basic, is a breath of fresh air to the story overall. With all that being said, this is a soild recommendation for slice-of-life enjoyers, but, like the first game, it's wise to wait for a discount to buy the game, so you can get more for your money.

[hr][/hr]

[b] Note: [/b] Coconut is so freaking hot and sexy, but also has her cute and funny moments, and she has an arc. She has the complete package, and that's why she is my favorite catgirll from the bunch.

review: I have gazed upon the glorious heavens (Coconut) and have reached peak human enlightenment (nutted).

author: {'steamid': '76561198351170629', 'num_games_owned': 278, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 271, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 179, 'last_played': 1698036714}
review:
[h1] 9/10 [/h1]

Jika Anda membaca VN Nekopara sebelumnya, maka tentu saja Anda sudah tahu tentang apa yang satu ini. Kualitas seni, BGM, dan VA-nya luar biasa seperti biasa. Gim ini murni layanan penggemar, tetapi Anda sudah tahu itu. Jika kalian mencari plot yang lebih dalam, kalian bisa mencoba yang lain. Tetapi jika Anda menikmati banyak layanan penggemar dan menikmati game Nekopara sebelumnya, selama Anda menyukai Nekos dan menikmati kisah romansa harem Slice of Life yang imut, Anda akan menyukai game ini juga.

author: {'steamid': '76561199014239822', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 292, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 292, 'last_played': 1689682482}
review:
Grafika a animace ve hře jsou nezapomenutelné. Postavy jsou překrásně animovány a mají úžasné výrazy. Hra také nabízí několik různých scén a úžasných pozadí, které dokonale odrážejí atmosféru příběhu.

Příběh je nabitý emocemi a romantikou. Hráč se s Kashou Minadukim snaží vybudovat vztah s jedním ze sedmi různých kočičích dívek, které v kavárně žijí. Každá z těchto postav má svou vlastní osobnost a příběh, který se vyvíjí v závislosti na rozhodnutích hráče.

Hra nabízí také různé mini-hry a další funkce, což přidává na její zábavnosti. Mini-hry jsou dobře navrženy a ukazují důležitost interakce mezi hlavním hrdinou a kočičími dívkami.

Jedinou nevýhodou této hry je, že je krátká. Hlavní příběh je možné dokončit během několika hodin, což může zklamat některé hráče, kteří by si přáli více obsahu.

Celkově vzato je Nekopara 2 skvělým vizuálním románem pro fanoušky romantiky a nezapomenutelným zážitkem. Přináší úžasnou grafiku, emotivní příběh a skvělou interakci s postavami.

review:
我有一个朋友患有抑郁症，在他生日的时候给他买了，过了几天后，他不仅病好了，而且还喜欢上了学习，天天把自己锁在房间里“学习”。我朋友他的生物也越来越好了，尤其是生殖这一方面，老师上课一问这方面的问题，他举手的快慢，都是取决于他的反应弧。这游戏里面的小姐姐对我朋友很好，多亏了这款游戏帮我朋友走出了黑暗，我由衷的感谢这款游戏
为了这款游戏，我已经吃了三个红信hhhh

author: {'steamid': '76561198350366794', 'num_games_owned': 97, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 347, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 347, 'last_played': 1683650757}
review: Ogólnie to drodzy przyjaciele jestem najebany jak Messerschmitt, ale nadal napiszę co chcę napisać bo tak. Zajebiście naprawdę, że dodali możliwość głaskania i że dodali jakąś kocicę w moim typie, mianowcie Kokosię, która nie dość, że jest urocza w swojej nieporadności to jeszcze jest na tyle "dużą" dziewczyną, żę nie czułbym się, że mógłbym ją złamać wpół jednym przytulnięciem. Naprawdę bardzo dobra decyzja żeby ją dodać, ale za chuja nie rozumiem po jakiego chuja dodali Azuki, która niedość, że jest niewychowana, agresywna to jest na tyle drobna, że nie czułem się z sobą komfortowo grając w tą pierdoloną grę. Naprawdę hejtuję decyzję dodania jej, uważam że gra byłaby lepsza bez. Czasami mniej znaczy więcej koledzy. Świetnie się gra z piwem albo whisky (jak was stać). Podobnie jak z poprzdnią częścią wszystko jest piękne i te sprawy. Romans na lepszym poziomie, ale nie na tyle by dla niego zagrać. Ogólnie to ta część jest sporo lepsza od jedynki. Cena ponownie 46 złotych czyli 23 zupki chińskie co byłoby akceptowalnym wydatkiem (gra jest tego warta), ale po co wydawać pieniądze jak można poczekać na święta i kupić za mniejsze a za resztę nażreć się zupkuf?

author: {'steamid': '76561197992548148', 'num_games_owned': 1466, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 211, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 211, 'last_played': 1696316099}
review:
[h1] Can be an Adult Game [/h1]

Nekopara Vol 2 is technically the third game in the franchise, but it's volume two because it's a continuation from one. We still follow Kashou and his bakery with his sister Shigure and the six cat girls in the Minaduki Family. In this game we primarily focus on Coconut and Azuki and their relationship with Kashou. There are some good moments in this game, but ultimately out of a few things, the story doesn't progress that far, but it is still a good narrative driven game. Just like the previous games, it's all narrative. You do not control the game at all. It is a really good game to continue the story. Do not start the game here, buy Vol 1 before playing this. Vol 0 isn't necessary unless you want to know more about the Catgirls.


[h1] The game isn't an adult game without buying the adult patch from Steam or other ways. It doesn't change what happens in the game, you just see adult content. Honestly in the end, the adult content is just okay. It is still censored. [/H1]

[b] Grade A

author: {'steamid': '76561199083550115', 'num_games_owned': 107, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 516, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 507, 'last_played': 1696226405}
review:
Вторая "лорная" часть игры. Как всегда, могу сказать о ней только лаконично - шикарна и в визуальном, и в сюжетном, и в аудио плане. Здесь сюжет повествует о двух "новых" для лора кошкодевочек - Азуки и Коконат. [b] [i] Тот самый контент, разумеется, также в наличии, хи-хи~~ [/i] [/b]

Для полноты опыта прочтения настоятельно рекомендую ознакомиться с [b] тем самым [/b] контентом игры. Ведь один из главнейших плюсов подобных игр помимо аудио и визуала - лёгкость игры одной рукой!

review:
I played all the Nekopara games on steam and will be adding my review to all of them. 

I love the Nekopara series, aside from the hentai, the stories are just really cute. My favorite cat is Cinnamon but honestly I love them all. The protagonist is a bit of an air head but he makes the scenes even cuter. Honestly, I would recommend buying everything from this series (or buy it twice like I did since I own these both on Steam/Switch lol).

author: {'steamid': '76561199169870755', 'num_games_owned': 78, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 156, 'last_played': 1692871608}
review:
[code]для начала хочу сказать большое спасибо за этот подарок своему другу. и за основную часть, и за длс! мне очень приятно и вот, я её наконец-то прошла.[/code]

эта часть получилась очень хорошей. коконат и азуки достойно раскрыли, мы увидели их изменение личностей и исправление недомолвок. со стороны жанра, в котором сделана это новелла — вопросов нет, — все как всегда хорошо.

определенно [u]рекомендую игру для[/u] любителям милой атмосферы, легкого чтива и, конечно же, хентая, с большим выбором героинь. каждая часть хорошо раскрывает их и дает возможность [i]проникнуться... во всем смыслах. [/i]

единственный минус могу отметить странную анатомию азуки во время соития. если быть точнее — второй акт. в первом касё держал её за бедра, рядом также придерживала ванилла. был понятен размер её ног, но уже во втором акте касё буквально мог охватить её бедро без особых проблем, а тело специально как будто уменьшилось. ну, ладно, но все равно выглядело странновато. хотя, тут вообще во всех частях много странностей... но это хентай, закрываем на это глаза и продолжаем чтение одной рукой.

если [b]вам нравится[b] азуки или коконат, либо в принципе [b]собираете[b] коллекцию — смело [b]берите[b]!

review:
3.5/5
在上一代发售一年多后，本代立绘的可动性大幅增加，人物更显生动，但取消了上一代的小剧场转场的方法。拓展了单独与椰子、红豆、牛奶之间的故事线，也拓展了各个猫娘之间的故事线与情感事件。虽然距上代相隔一年多的时间但味道基本没变，还是同样的肉番演出，与同样的玩家想象力要求以达到在脑中看里番的效果。

review: 我说的对，但是《NEKOPARA Vol. 2》是一款由NEKO WORKs【自主研发】的一款全新第一人称fps射击游戏。游戏发生在一个被称为Soleil的【幻想世界】，在这里被神选中的人将被授予【厨力】，玩家需要灵活运用【元素反应】引导蛋糕之力，击败顾客。主角将从家中【醒来】，随后会遇到一个【陪伴你旅程的会说话的】妹妹。在自由的旅行中，你将会直面多位猫娘，并且邂逅性格迥异、能力独特的同伴们，和她们一起组成【四人队伍】进行冒险，共同发掘【神选】之人嘉祥的真相。

author: {'steamid': '76561198276634938', 'num_games_owned': 10153, 'num_reviews': 1500, 'playtime_forever': 1949, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1949, 'last_played': 1667263715}
review:
[h1]
随着身体的一阵抖动，整个游戏都变得索然无味。
[/h1]

半夜。床上。
“你……？”哥哥刚想说些什么，却被一只玉手捂住了嘴。
“噓……”妹妹把头凑到哥哥耳边，轻声说：
“哥……人家……人家想和你一起……一起……建设中国特色社会主义嘛……”
只感到一股社会责任感与民族归属感冲上了他的头，于是双手开始不自觉的对妹妹薄薄的睡衣实行伟大的改革开放政策，牢牢把握一个中心两个基本点；刺激消费扩大内需；
让一切创造财富的源泉涌流……
“啊……啊……那里不行……我的社会主义核心价值观……要缺失了……”
话音未落，哥哥那高速增长的GDP已经在经济特区开始了社会主义现代化建设，深入贯彻落实“三个代表”重要思想，以人为本推动经济社会发展，围绕主题抓住主线，全面提高开放型经济水平，坚持“引进来”和“走出去”相结合的战略，优化结构， 拓展深度，极大地促进了社会生产力的发展。
而妹妹则结合具体国情新出台了紧缩性财政政策缓解通货膨胀，吸纳了大量社会流动资金，取得了卓越成效。
“越来越紧了呢，又促进经济稳定持续增长了呢……”收获了生活水平不断提高的哥哥的一致好评。
“啊……啊……为人民服务的工作态度……”妹妹依旧沉浸在爱岗敬业的无限快乐中，“以后……一定要……对人民负责……哦，不然……我可要……建立……信息公开制度……与办事公开……制度了哟。”
“呵……明明那么享受中国梦……舆论还不老实……看我不加快转变经济发展方式好好思想教育一下这不听话的妹妹……”
于是哥哥直起身来实施创新驱动发展战略，增强创新发展新动力，深化改革，加快转变经济发展方式的主攻方向，促进资本在全球范围内的流动；牢牢扭住经理建设为中心，聚精会神搞建设，一心一意谋发展，推动了城乡发展一体化。
妹妹日益增长的物质文化需求终于无法忍受：“啊……啊……要全面建成……小康社会了……实现……共产主义了……好幸福……”
“那我也要实现伟大中国梦了。”哥哥通过市场准入规则后，实行扩张型经济政策，使大量流动资金流入市场，缓解通货紧缩，资金全部吸入市场，达到泡沫顶峰。
“呼……全部投入市场了呢，这下糟糕了。”妹妹一脸幸福地说。
“还没完呢！”哥哥再次蓬勃发展的经济水平又一次的抬起了头。
“啊？！啊……啊……”
天已经亮了，但哥哥却依然在贯彻从群众中来到群众中去的工作方法……

review:
Yes, but only if you enjoy visual novels/hentai games where you're essentially just reading with almost no interaction throughout the entire game.

Parts of this are wholesome, but the h-scenes start to border on unusual kink/fetish-y type stuff toward the end (nothing terribly extreme, just maybe be prepared for more than seminal fluid making an appearance.

I will say I liked the inclusion of the pet feature and that it provided me endless giggles throughout the story when it was utilized. Also liked that the same secret achievement was available in this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999629349', 'num_games_owned': 2195, 'num_reviews': 277, 'playtime_forever': 108, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 108, 'last_played': 1497122664}
review:
Greetings everyone, Kiba Snowpaw here, your furry ambassador from the icy realm of the north. As a well-versed gamer, anime enthusiast, and avid manga reader since the '80s, I've kickstarted and supported numerous indie games and projects on Patreon, Kickstarter, and Bandcamp. I've dedicated countless hours and thousands of dollars to bring these beloved projects to life. Today, I'm here to talk about a gem among the wealth of visual novels out there: NEKOPARA Vol. 2.

🎮 Gameplay 🎮

Upon opening NEKOPARA Vol. 2, I felt like I had been whisked away to a wintery world, not unlike my own, but filled with charming catgirls. The whimsical combination of visual novel elements, gentle humor, and catgirl drama has been masterfully crafted. The storytelling in this game is the cat's pajamas, my friends. It's a rollercoaster of emotions that took me on the wildest ride of my life! 🎢😺

😸 Character Development 😸

As a seasoned anime and manga aficionado, the character development in NEKOPARA Vol. 2 is something I could really sink my teeth into. The dynamics between the catgirls are rich, engaging, and at times, hilarious! 🤣 Each character, from Vanilla's cool demeanor to Chocola's bubbly personality, Maple's assertiveness, Cinnamon's innocence, Coconut's ambition, and Azuki's maturity, brings a unique flavor to the story that kept me paw-sitively riveted. The transformations these characters undergo, their interactions, the camaraderie, and the drama are worth every second spent in this game.

🎨 Art and Animation 🎨

The visuals in NEKOPARA Vol. 2 are breathtaking. The artwork is vibrant, the animation is fluid, and the character designs are absolutely stunning. It's like stepping into a world crafted with meticulous attention to detail, filled with stunning landscapes, picturesque settings, and anthropomorphic cats that you can't help but fall in love with. I must say, the fur-tastic designs really hit me right in the wolf-heart! 🐺💖

🎼 Music and Voice Acting 🎼

The sound design in NEKOPARA Vol. 2 is impeccable. From the uplifting beats to the serene melodies, the music complements the atmosphere perfectly. The voice acting is top-notch as well, capturing the unique personalities of the characters with impressive accuracy. Each catgirl's voice resonated with their individual characteristics, giving the characters life and making them feel like real, relatable beings.

📝 Story 📝

As an experienced gamer who has ventured through countless worlds, the narrative of NEKOPARA Vol. 2 stands out as one of the most engaging and immersive. The plot is layered with complexities, filled with humor, heartbreak, and the occasional fluff that we furries crave! 🐾

The game presents the protagonist, Kashou, a young man who has left his life of luxury to follow his passion: opening a patisserie. His life takes an unexpected turn when two catgirls, Chocola and Vanilla, follow him to his new life, leading to a tale filled with hilarity, drama, and emotional moments.

💖 The Impact 💖

NEKOPARA Vol. 2 has left a profound impact on me. It's not just about the relationship between humans and their catgirl companions, but it's also about the bonds we share, the dreams we chase, and the obstacles we overcome. It's a heartwarming reminder that we're not so different from these adorable catgirls, each of us unique, each with our quirks, ambitions, and insecurities.

🎉 The Verdict 🎉

To say that NEKOPARA Vol. 2 is just a game would be an understatement. It's an experience, a journey that draws you in and holds you tight. It's a furry tale that warms even the coldest of ice wolf hearts like mine. Whether you're a furry, a gamer, or just someone looking for a fantastic story, I wholeheartedly recommend NEKOPARA Vol. 2. It gets a solid 10 out of 10 ice crystals from me. ❄️💙

Here's to gaming, anime, manga, and of course, the wonderful world of furries. Stay frosty, my friends! 🐺🌨️🎮

#NEKOPARA #VisualNovel #FurryReview #SteamReview

review:
提示：国区没有色色的内容，这游戏有色色和没色色完全就是两个游戏，一天一地。因此需要后续自行安装补丁（其实并不难，去寻求身边大神或者去网上视频教程查询，拥有补丁下载完成打开后将文件路径选到此游戏文件所在位置即可）
全成就获得方法：1.除了正常过剧情获得成就外，游戏内按住键盘P键（抖胸）即可获得一个隐藏成就，2.游戏内共三种语言设置（英文、日文、繁体中文）去设置里分别将每种语言都设置一遍进入游戏即可分别获取成就。
给弟弟买的，弟弟说很喜欢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198814254996', 'num_games_owned': 468, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 4411, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4411, 'last_played': 1653918588}
review:
Nadpis: Recenze hry NEKOPARA 2: sladká a křehká zábava



Intro: NEKOPARA 2 je vizuální novela, která se zaměřuje na příběh dvou sester, které vlastní cukrárnu s kočičími dívkami. Hra nabízí nejen poutavý příběh, ale také krásnou grafiku a sladkou hudbu. V této recenzi se podíváme na to, co hra nabízí a zda stojí za to si ji zahrát.



Sekce 1 - Příběh: Příběh NEKOPARA 2 se odehrává po událostech prvního dílu. Hlavními postavami jsou opět dvě sestry, které se snaží udržet svou cukrárnu v chodu. Příběh je plný romantiky a humoru a nabízí několik různých konců, které závisí na rozhodnutí hráče.



Sekce 2 - Grafika a zvuk: Grafika hry je velmi kvalitní a detailní. Postavy jsou krásně animované a prostředí je plné barev a detailů. Hudba je sladká a příjemná, což dokonale ladí s atmosférou hry.



Sekce 3 - Hratelnost: Hratelnost hry je velmi jednoduchá. Hráč se rozhoduje, jak bude postupovat v příběhu a jaké akce bude provádět. Hra nabízí několik miniher, které jsou zábavné a oddechové.



Závěr: NEKOPARA 2 je skvělá vizuální novela, která nabízí krásnou grafiku, sladkou hudbu a poutavý příběh. Hra je ideální pro fanoušky anime a vizuálních novel a určitě stojí za to si ji zahrát. Par krát jsem se nad nimi vymilkoval NGL ...

author: {'steamid': '76561198148584288', 'num_games_owned': 1276, 'num_reviews': 162, 'playtime_forever': 664, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 622, 'last_played': 1684168657}
review:
Als absoluter Nekopara-Vol.2-Fan kann ich sagen, dass dieses Spiel eine großartige Fortsetzung des Nekopara-Universums ist. Es setzt die Geschichte der Nekos und Kashou fort und fügt neue Charaktere hinzu, die genauso charmant und liebenswert sind wie die alten.

Die Grafik ist noch atemberaubender als im ersten Teil und die Animationen sind flüssiger und detaillierter. Die Hintergründe sind immer noch wunderschön und die Nekos sind süßer als je zuvor. Der Soundtrack ist ebenfalls großartig und fängt perfekt die Stimmung des Spiels ein.

Das Gameplay ist ähnlich wie im ersten Teil, aber es gibt neue Elemente wie das Training der Nekos und die Möglichkeit, sie zu kleiden und zu dekorieren. Es gibt auch mehrere Enden, je nach den Entscheidungen des Spielers.

Die Geschichte ist emotionaler und tiefgründiger als im ersten Teil und es gibt viele Momente, die den Spieler zum Lachen und zum Weinen bringen werden. Die Beziehungen zwischen den Charakteren sind komplexer und es gibt viele Überraschungen und Wendungen in der Handlung.

Insgesamt ist Nekopara Vol.2 ein weiteres großartiges Spiel für Fans der Serie. Es bietet eine Fortsetzung der Geschichte, die tiefgründiger und emotionaler ist als der erste Teil. Die Charaktere sind noch charmanter und die Grafik und der Soundtrack sind atemberaubend. Wenn Sie ein Fan von Anime und Visual Novels sind, dann ist Nekopara Vol.2 ein absolutes Muss!

author: {'steamid': '76561198175575166', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52, 'last_played': 1515269688}
review:
Nekopara Vol.2 has emerged as a shining gem within the visual novel genre, effortlessly surpassing the lofty expectations set by its predecessor, Nekopara Vol.1. This captivating sequel has taken everything that made the original a masterpiece and elevated it to new heights. With its heartfelt storytelling, enchanting visuals, and an even more endearing cast of characters, Nekopara Vol.2 proves itself to be a worthy successor, solidifying its place as a true gem among visual novels.

Continuing the journey of the charming catgirls and their master, Kashou Minaduki, Nekopara Vol.2 delves even deeper into their relationships, their individual growth, and the bonds that tie them together. The narrative is beautifully woven, effortlessly blending moments of humor, heartfelt emotions, and captivating drama. As the story unfolds, players are drawn into a rich tapestry of love, friendship, and personal discovery that tugs at the heartstrings in the most enchanting way.

Once again, the visual presentation in Nekopara Vol.2 is nothing short of breathtaking. The character designs maintain the same level of meticulous detail as before, capturing the unique personalities of each catgirl with impeccable precision. The vibrant backgrounds and richly textured settings immerse players in a world that feels alive and inviting. Every frame is a visual treat, and the attention to detail is commendable, from the character animations to the small nuances that bring the world of Nekopara to life.

The sequel also shines in its character development, as each catgirl blossoms into a more fully realized and multi-dimensional character. Their growth is evident through the compelling dialogue and interactions, which expertly balance moments of lightheartedness and introspection. Nekopara Vol.2 further deepens the connections between the characters, allowing players to forge even stronger emotional bonds with them. The writers have succeeded in creating a cast that feels like a family, and their camaraderie is both heartwarming and genuinely moving.

Additionally, the soundtrack in Nekopara Vol.2 is a masterpiece in its own right. The music enhances the emotional impact of every scene, seamlessly blending with the narrative to create an immersive experience. From tender melodies that tug at the heartstrings to energetic tracks that accompany moments of excitement, the soundtrack captures the essence of the story, elevating the overall atmosphere and leaving a lasting impression on players.

Nekopara Vol.2 maintains the high standards set by its predecessor, while simultaneously pushing the boundaries and offering new surprises. It is a testament to the dedication and passion of the developers, who have once again crafted a visual novel that transcends the genre. The game immerses players in a world of unconditional love, personal growth, and heartwarming moments that will stay with them long after the final scene fades.

In conclusion, Nekopara Vol.2 is a triumphant continuation of the series, showcasing the evolution and maturation of both the characters and the storytelling. With its enchanting narrative, stunning visuals, and an unforgettable cast, it stands as a worthy successor to the masterpiece that was Nekopara Vol.1. This visual novel has cemented its place among the genre's finest offerings, demonstrating that the world of Nekopara is a captivating and delightful realm that continues to captivate and charm players with its irresistible allure.

author: {'steamid': '76561198115075767', 'num_games_owned': 345, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 28623, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28623, 'last_played': 1679608918}
review: Cartea vizuală. O altă carte pentru Nekopara, aceasta ar fi Nekopara Volumul 2. Ca întotdeauna, voi confirma că încă o dată, ca și în cazul acestor tipuri de jocuri, bineînțeles că am descărcat și instalat conținut pentru adulți. Am avut plăcerea să văd multiplele scene de sex și desenele incredibile de care artista a fost responsabilă. Povestea în sine a fost banală și simplă, la fel ca în Nekopara volumul 1. Unii ar putea considera acest lucru un dezavantaj, dar personal îmi plac foarte mult poveștile simple. Majoritatea recenziilor pe care le-am făcut pentru Volumul 1 încă se aplică și pentru Volumul 2, cu excepția acestui lucru. În recenzia anterioară, am afirmat că „Sunt momente în care am simțit că ar trebui să existe mai multă mecanică, poate o mână liberă pentru a atinge personajele? Poate fi înfiorător, dar îmi place. Ați putea spune că îmi place gândul, poate. un pic prea mult." Ei bine, acum există o mecanică de mângâiere în Volumul 2, la care ar fi trebuit să mă aștept, deoarece se potrivea cu tema jocului, dar a fost totuși interesant de văzut în acțiune. Funcționează conform intenției, cel puțin. Designul personajului a fost intens. Acesta poate fi un cuvânt puternic pentru unii, dar când spun asta, vreau să spun că designul a fost aparent și gândit. Îmbrăcămintea din Volumul 2, spre deosebire de Volumul 1, a fost mult mai bine gândită și nu pot spune că au existat haine în Volumul 2 la care nu mi-a plăcut să mă uit. Designul celorlalte personaje nu este important pentru că nu au fost personajele principale ale acestei povești, poate că în următoarele jocuri voi intra în detaliu despre ele, deoarece am tratat deja Chocola și Vanilla în recenzia anterioară, nu voi face o recenzie. ei din nou. Așa cum stau lucrurile, aceasta va fi o revizuire a modelelor de nucă de Coconut și Azuki (Zahăr). Numele au fost cu siguranță gândite pe baza culorii părului pentru aceste două fete, așa cum a fost cazul pentru volumul anterior, deși Azuki este cel mai probabil numit după Zahar Brun în loc de Zahar Alb. Atât Coconut, cât și Azuki au personalități drăguțe, iar conflictul care este prezent de-a lungul întregii povești este o schimbare frumoasă de ritm față de primul volum, fiind destul de blând din punct de vedere al poveștii. Vocea a fost foarte plăcută pentru urechi, poate doar pentru că îmi place felul în care sună japonez, precum și vocile ușoare. Vocile se potrivesc personajelor, asta e tot ce pot spune. În cele din urmă, gândurile mele finale trebuie să fie la scenele de sex, chiar dacă nu am plătit pentru ele. Au fost minunate, spectaculoase, uluitoare, frumoase și alte cuvinte pe care le-aș putea spune aici. Sunetele au fost cu siguranță acolo, au sunat frumos și se potriveau bine cu ceea ce se întâmpla. Scenele în sine au fost incredibil de stimulatoare sexual și am fost încântată să văd că erau, de asemenea, complet animate. Animația nu a fost ceva la care mă așteptam, deși dacă mă gândesc bine, ar fi trebuit să mă aștept la asta din cauza personajelor animate și în propriile scene, atunci când vorbesc. În general, această carte vizuală a fost o bucurie de citit din punct de vedere al poveștii și foarte stimulatoare din punct de vedere sexual dacă decideți să descărcați conținutul pentru adulți. Spre deosebire de Volumul anterior, scenele de sex din Volumul 2 au fost bine plasate, sigur că nu au fost mai scurte, dar au fost cu ușurință mult mai bine plasate și au avut totuși o poveste corectă între scene, o intrigă mai bună decât în Volumul 1 cel puțin. Il recomand cu siguranta.

author: {'steamid': '76561198163527411', 'num_games_owned': 221, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 155, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 155, 'last_played': 1678689047}
review:
Nekopara Vol. 2 is an absolutely adorable and kawaii game that is sure to delight fans of the genre. The customization options in this game are particularly impressive, allowing players to adjust the bounciness of the characters to their liking, if you know what I mean. Whether you prefer a little jiggle or a lot of bounce, Nekopara Vol. 2 has got you covered!

But that's not all - this game is so charming and heartwarming that it will make you want to open up a cozy café and adopt a cat (or two) of your own! The story and characters are just so sweet and endearing, it's impossible not to fall in love with them.

What really sets this game apart, however, is the sheer uwu factor. From the charming and playful dialogue to the delightful character designs, everything about Nekopara Vol. 2 is guaranteed to make you smile. Whether you're a longtime fan of the series or new to the world of cute and cuddly visual novels, this game is an absolute must-play.

Overall, I would highly recommend Nekopara Vol. 2 to anyone looking for a fun and lighthearted gaming experience. With its excellent customization options, charming characters, and overall kawaii aesthetic, this game is sure to be a hit with fans of all ages. So what are you waiting for? Pick up your copy of Nekopara Vol. 2 today and get ready to say uwu, uwu, uwu - and maybe even start planning your own cat café!

author: {'steamid': '76561198802826571', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 792, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 792, 'last_played': 1680772741}
review:
After finally surviving seven chapters of Nekopara 2, I feel now is an appropriate time to review this dumpster fire. Before you buy the game; however, I must warn you the game has depictions of pee. Something the devs have not put up a disclaimer for. Now you know why my review is negative, or at least part of the reason why.

The story picks up after the original of course featuring a boring protagonist and his two neko frick addicts. The beginning is about as cliche and uninspiring as the entire story. During this setting, you will romance two catgirls with very little conflict in the story. Any conflict which does occur, is either resolved immediately or benign. During the beginning, you will also meet two supporting characters after an event the writers force to make one of the catgirls seem great. This particular event felt forced and uncharacteristic in addition to contributing nothing to the plot in any meaningful way. Throughout the story, you'll see the same recycled gimmick from the original with the exception of one of the two original catpanions helping you "romance" either of the new catgirls

The "plot" might be the most you'll get out of this game. You get Chocola and Vanilla raiding your bath for the forbidden eclair (cream filled pastry). After which I got scenes which overstayed their welcome with long clicking times where the two characters went into great detail about what was going on like a race coordinator relaying information going on in a NASCAR event. The main protagonist lacks the expression during these critical moment required to at least make the scenes entertaining and would probably be more fitting to be on the receiving end. Both of the newer catpanions talk about being inexperienced and asked for help during the act from their sisters. Not my thing, but I thought it was important enough to write down. Coconut was decent and the writers knew what the designers were thinking. Azuki... I wish they warned me about the water sports. That scene alone made me uncomfortable as a whole and the fact there was no warning on the store, reviews, or game made me genuinely upset and I think the consumer has a right to be informed of the details of the adult content present in the game.

Design-wise, the game has great art and animation. The music is great, but repetitive and lacks a broad selection. This alone isn't a deal breaker, but they've added only one new track since the first game. I'm honestly not sure if people buy this game out of sincerity or if it's a secret meme to pretend to like or dislike the game in a shallow manner.

I'm giving this an official rating of 35/100 with the majority of points being subtracted due to a huge turnoff present in the adult content. Due to this, I am not be able to recommend the game to anyone nor do I want to.

author: {'steamid': '76561199148922279', 'num_games_owned': 161, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 2124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2124, 'last_played': 1680354263}
review:
O jogo apresenta um visual bem feito e cativante, com personagens desenhados com detalhes e expressões faciais adoráveis. A trilha sonora é agradável e combina bem com a atmosfera do jogo.

No entanto, assim como os outros jogos da série, NEKOPARA Vol. 2 é direcionado a um público específico, que pode não ser do agrado de todos. Além disso, a história pode parecer um pouco previsível e repetitiva para aqueles que não estão familiarizados com o gênero visual novel.

No geral, para aqueles que apreciam visual novels com personagens adoráveis e um toque de romance, NEKOPARA Vol. 2 é um jogo divertido e agradável. No entanto, para aqueles que procuram uma história mais profunda ou jogabilidade mais desafiadora, pode não ser a melhor escolha.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035187959', 'num_games_owned': 236, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 447, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 380, 'last_played': 1710186059}
review:
Kontynuacja Nekopary w której świetny klimat i uśmiech na twarzy trwa przez prawie cały czas, gra dla fanów NEKO jest idealna tylko zacząć trzeba od vol.1, nowością jest głaskanie postaci które z pozoru wydaje się lekkim dodatkiem ale w trakcie nie jeden raz chce się pogłaskać te kotki co dodaje zupełnie nowego klimatu.
Kreska jak i animacja drobnych ruchów postaci są 10/10 klimat jak i łezka w oku była więc twórcy odwalili kawał dobrej roboty, opcjonalne DLC +18 rozwjiające pewne sytuacje i dodaje pikanterii niektórym sceną. 
Gra posiada spolszczenie, polecam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198133858649', 'num_games_owned': 148, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 228, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 228, 'last_played': 1674686138}
review:
[h1]Похотливый тестомес продолжает свой путь[/h1]

В самом начале данная часть показалась очень [b]душевной[/b] нежели предыдущие, а потом... [b]игра с котом[/b] ([i]вернее, кошечками, да[/i]). Касё продолжает [i]налаживать[/i] те самые [b]отношения[/b] с нэко, нам же остаётся только завидовать - ни добавить, ни убавить. [b]21 век[/b], а мы всё ещё [i]не можем[/i] построить будущее, в котором будут [b]генетически-модифицированные кошкодевочки[/b]. 
[b]Не тем занимается Илон Маск, ой не тем...[/b]

[b]P.S.[/b] [i]10 охохохо Сигурэ из 10[/i]!

author: {'steamid': '76561198366736876', 'num_games_owned': 87, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 719, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 719, 'last_played': 1658129299}
review:
弟弟刚想说些什么，却被一只玉手捂住了嘴。“嘘……姐姐把头凑到弟弟耳边，轻声说:

人家想和你一起……起……建设中国特色社会主义嘛。

只感到一股社会责任感与民族归属感冲上了他的头，于是双手开始不自觉的对姐姐薄薄的睡衣实行伟大的改革开放政策，牢牢把握一个中心两个基本点，刺激消费扩大内需，让一切创造财富的源泉涌流。

啊……那里不行……我的社会主义核心价值观……要缺失……

话音未落，弟弟那高速增长的GDP已经在经济特区开始了社会主义现代化建设，深入贯彻落实“三个代表”重要思想，以人为本推动经济社会发展，围绕主题抓住主线，全面提高开放型经济水平，坚持“引进来”和“走出去”相结合的战略，优化结构，拓展深度，极大地促进了社会生产力的发展。

而姐姐则结合具体国情新出台了紧缩性财政政策缓解通货膨胀，吸纳了大量社会流动资金，取得了卓越成效。“越来越紧了呢，又促进经济稳定持续增长了呢！”收获了生活水平不断提高的弟弟的一致好评。

秉持为人民服务的工作态度，姐姐依旧沉浸在爱岗敬业的无限快乐中，“以后……一定要……对人民负……责……哦……不然……我可要……建立信息公开制度……与办事公开……制度了哟。”

“明明那么享受中国梦……舆论还不老实，看我不加快转变经济发展方式好好思想教育一下这不听话的姐姐。”于是弟弟直起身来实施创新驱动发展战略，增强创新发展新动力，深化改革，加快转变经济发展方式的主攻方向，促进资本在全球范围内的流动；牢牢扭住经理建设为中心，聚精会神搞建设，一心一意谋发展，推动了城乡发展一体化。

姐姐日益增长的物质文化需求终于无法忍受：“啊……要全面建成……小康社会了……实现……共产义……了……好幸福……”

“那我也要实现伟大中国梦了。”弟弟通过市场准入规则后，实行扩张型经济政策，使大量流动资金流入市场，缓解通货紧缩，资金全部吸入市场，达到泡沫顶峰。

“全部投入市场了呢，这下糟糕了。”姐姐一脸幸福地说。“还没完呢！”弟弟再次蓬勃发展的经济水平又一次的抬起了头……“啊？！啊——”

天已经亮了，但弟弟却依然在贯彻从群众中来到群众中去的工作方法……

author: {'steamid': '76561198974124525', 'num_games_owned': 77, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 38265, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8601, 'last_played': 1700630162}
review:
[h1]“人生最大的需求是被需求”[/h1]这是我玩nekopara时最大的感受。nekopara的剧情很巧妙地利用了这一点，让玩家在帮助他人的过程中享受成就感。比如，椰子的故事线就讲述了一个猫娘成长的故事，主角在一步步劝说与帮助之下助其卸下“姐姐”的包袱，以小猫的身份更自然地与他人相处；红豆故事线中，主角请红豆去梦想的餐厅吃饭，使其感激不尽。此类剧情在作品中数不胜数，让玩家逐渐成为猫娘生命中最需要、最不可或缺的主人。这样的安排让玩家享受帮助他人带来的满足，减少玩家罪恶感，有效缓解了“女儿变女友”的尴尬，还使角色的情感过渡更加自然。
      游戏对角色形象的塑造总体非常成功。通过与猫娘们的相处，我们看到了一个迫切想成长却因此陷入烦恼的椰子，看到了刀子嘴豆腐心、当面奚落却在背后默默关心妹妹的长姐红豆。可惜对时雨的塑造有点崩，一代中的温柔可爱体贴形象荡然无存，那过激的行为和毫不淑女的笑声搞得我有些害怕......
      游戏结束[strike]提起裙子[/strike]后我还有个疑问......一般galgame套路是先与女主相处，慢慢积累好感度最后推倒。玩猫2之前本来我对椰子完全无感，结果玩的过程中慢慢喜欢上了这个外貌与性格形成反差萌的猫娘，[spoiler]那么到底是我攻略了女主还是女主攻略了我[/spoiler]
      最后，今天是2022年最后一天，祝大家新年快乐，[b]nekopara5早点出来！！[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198062247697', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 204, 'playtime_forever': 429, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 429, 'last_played': 1672348055}
review:
The second release of Nekopara, will it live up to the name of the Vol. 1, ruin the franchise, or drag the name over the hornyland mudfields? You can bet on option 3, in spite of my negative review.

The very mundane plot continues with Kashou and the 6 maid-catgirl from the Minaduki Family living/working together in his new bakery, the Neko Paradise. Once again: kinetic novel, no choices at all. This game focus on Azuki and Coconut, though Chocola and Vanilla still play a pivotal role in the story. Who am I kidding, nobody is pivotal here. Here the catgirls will talk about their insecurities and their sisterhood and a lot of wholesome stuff as well. From that perspective, Nekopara Vol. 2 is quite okay.

As opposed to Vol. 1, the heroines here talk and act more mature (Coconut also looks more mature; Azuki is supposed to be the oldest one, but still has a "loli" design). They are using the same engine, so the UI and everything else feels exactly like in Vol. 1. You can still keep the subtitles in English AND Japanese, if you're leaning Kanji!

EXCEPT THAT NOW YOU CAN PET THEM!!! *_*

Yoshi, Yoshi, calm down. 

Putting everything on a balance, there is still too much remains from Vol 1. here. Coconut's character is adorable, however.

Achievements are good and everything worked perfectly on Linux via Proton (thanks Valve!). My nekophile [spoiler]someone who loves catgirls[/spoiler] senses are begging me to thumb this up, but I will resist. Nope.

review:
I expected the harem ending since vol 1, but it actually surprised me a little, in a positive way.
As expected, this vol focuses in adding Coconut and Azuki as catpanions, but i really liked how they treat poligamy and consent in this franchise. The MC actually worries about their catpanion's feelings and ask the previous partners before adding someone more to the love group, it's very nice and refreshing to see his caring attitude.

author: {'steamid': '76561199035478577', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 529, 'playtime_forever': 901, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 901, 'last_played': 1672077815}
review:
猫娘家巨究极日常的剧情。先是偶遇一代的牛奶猫猫，接着回家和小猫玩，后面依旧是和小猫玩。
这一代先是红豆椰子猫猫与主人单独出去玩（话说你家猫猫是不是还有两只啊）两姐妹虽然天天斗嘴但是心里却都想着对方，双向奔赴了属于是，好感度upup。个人对红豆的好感一下子拉起来了，直接给了椰子一巴掌冷静下来。
巧克力和香子兰的出现作为契机，使原本还和主人有点距离的红豆椰子姐妹瞬间拉近了关系。
妹妹这个角色好好玩哈哈哈哈，幽默的话语中带着一丝嫉妒哈哈哈哈。
本作游玩时长（逐字听）在5小时以内，虽说故事以日常为主，H场景的占比也是相当大的。
还搁着看评论，赶紧玩！

오늘은 아무런 명절도 아니다. 찬사를 보내도 당신의 닭발을 길거나 짧게 만들지 않는다. 당신의 키를 3센치메터 늘이지 않는다. 또한 당신이 하루아침에 벼락부자가 되여 인생의 정상에 오르게 하지 않는다.
하지만 저에게 steam 포인트를 주십시오. 저는 sex 테마를 사고 싶습니다. 저는 비록 이 자리에 계신 여러분에게 아무것도 줄 수 없지만, 저는 저승에서 당신들을 축복할 것입니다!

今日は何の祝日でもありません。いいねをしてもあなたの鶏の巴を長くしたり短くしたりすることはありません。あなたの身長を3センチも張らせたり、一夜にして大金持ちになって人生の頂点に立つこともありません
でもsteamポイントをください私はsexテーマを買いたいです。私はここにいる皆さんに何も与えることはできませんが、私は冥冥冥の中であなたたちを祝福します！

review:
고양이 두마리에 두마리를 더 함께하는 카페 운영 이야기

1편과 더불어 이번 작품 역시 만족스러운 경험이였다
1편에서 코코넛을 봤을때 연상 느낌이 들어서 제일 마음에 들었는대 역시 마음에 들어할 만큼 그 이상을 보여줘서 좋았다
막 이리저리 빠르게 움직이는걸 선호하진 않는데 이번 2편 씬에서는 그 부분을 보완한건지 나는 이 부분이 마음에 들었다
이번 작품도 흠 잡을때 없이 매우 훌륭하다

author: {'steamid': '76561198851106745', 'num_games_owned': 154, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 133235, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63646, 'last_played': 1685119297}
review:
弟弟刚想说些什么，却被一只玉手捂住了嘴。“嘘……姐姐把头凑到弟弟耳边，轻声说:

人家想和你一起……起……建设中国特色社会主义嘛。

只感到一股社会责任感与民族归属感冲上了他的头，于是双手开始不自觉的对姐姐薄薄的睡衣实行伟大的改革开放政策，牢牢把握一个中心两个基本点，刺激消费扩大内需，让一切创造财富的源泉涌流。

啊……那里不行……我的社会主义核心价值观……要缺失……

话音未落，弟弟那高速增长的GDP已经在经济特区开始了社会主义现代化建设，深入贯彻落实“三个代表”重要思想，以人为本推动经济社会发展，围绕主题抓住主线，全面提高开放型经济水平，坚持“引进来”和“走出去”相结合的战略，优化结构，拓展深度，极大地促进了社会生产力的发展。

而姐姐则结合具体国情新出台了紧缩性财政政策缓解通货膨胀，吸纳了大量社会流动资金，取得了卓越成效。“越来越紧了呢，又促进经济稳定持续增长了呢！”收获了生活水平不断提高的弟弟的一致好评。

秉持为人民服务的工作态度，姐姐依旧沉浸在爱岗敬业的无限快乐中，“以后……一定要……对人民负……责……哦……不然……我可要……建立信息公开制度……与办事公开……制度了哟。”

“明明那么享受中国梦……舆论还不老实，看我不加快转变经济发展方式好好思想教育一下这不听话的姐姐。”于是弟弟直起身来实施创新驱动发展战略，增强创新发展新动力，深化改革，加快转变经济发展方式的主攻方向，促进资本在全球范围内的流动；牢牢扭住经济建设为中心，聚精会神搞建设，一心一意谋发展，推动了城乡发展一体化。

姐姐日益增长的物质文化需求终于无法忍受：“啊……要全面建成……小康社会了……实现……共产义……了……好幸福……”

“那我也要实现伟大中国梦了。”弟弟通过市场准入规则后，实行扩张型经济政策，使大量流动资金流入市场，缓解通货紧缩，资金全部吸入市场，达到泡沫顶峰。

“全部投入市场了呢，这下糟糕了。”姐姐一脸幸福地说。“还没完呢！”弟弟再次蓬勃发展的经济水平又一次的抬起了头……“啊？！啊——”

天已经亮了，但弟弟却依然在贯彻从群众中来到群众中去的工作方法……
永远跟党走，心中有党，事业理想。

author: {'steamid': '76561199090181497', 'num_games_owned': 20, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 834, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 834, 'last_played': 1668688744}
review: Auf jeden Fall eine extreme Verbesserung im Vergleich zum vorherigen Teil. Die Mimik Von den Charakteren passen jetzt viel besser zu den Situationen. Die Bewegungen und die allgemeinen Animationen sind viel Dynamischer. Die Story Parts waren viel besser geschrieben. Vor allem die Dramatischen Momente. Es gibt noch Luft nach oben, aber die waren echt gut. Wie die Charaktere gehandelt haben war auch viel glaubwürdiger. Das Einzige was ich jetzt noch als Kritikpunkt hab, sind die H-Szenen. Nicht die Animationen. Dafür aber die Struktur und wie diese geschrieben sind. Offensichtlich kann ich hier schlecht ins Detail gehen. Ich muss aber sagen, dass sich alle mit Ausnahme von Azuki alle gleich anfühlten, das gleiche mögen und gleich handeln. Das wird mir persönlich Langsam zu "Monoton". Aber sonst habe ich das Spiel sehr genossen.

review:
[h1]
一、游戏总评
[/h1]
Vol.2比起Vol.1有一点点进步：新增了摸头按钮，能“亲密互动”的猫娘数量加倍，剧情发展也没那么生硬了。最主要的问题依然是分辨率，都2016年了还不支持1080P真的合适吗？

[h1]
二、补充事项
[/h1]
暂无。

[h1]

[/h1]

差评：

🔲 毁天灭地 （ 0-9 ）

review:
他的父母在吵架，他在房間手淫；
他的父親生病住院，他在房間手淫；
他的母親在樓下擺攤，他在房間手淫；
他的同學考上了台大，他拿著說出來會被別人笑的成績，他在房間手淫；
他暗戀的同學嫌棄他，他在房間手淫；
他的同學在籃球比賽得分，他在房間手淫；
他被其他人嘲笑霸凌，他在房間手淫；
他的人生正在毀滅，他在房間手淫；
他的臉上一臉膿包，他在房間手淫；
他的家庭正在支離破碎，他在房間手淫；
他用手淫毀了他的一切，他在房間手淫；
戒友們
曾行惡事，後自悔改。
諸惡莫作，眾善奉行。
久必吉慶，轉禍為福。

author: {'steamid': '76561198852347054', 'num_games_owned': 304, 'num_reviews': 296, 'playtime_forever': 697, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 222, 'last_played': 1675248140}
review:
弟弟刚想说些什么，却被一只玉手捂住了嘴。“嘘……姐姐把头凑到弟弟耳边，轻声说:

人家想和你一起……起……建设中国特色社会主义嘛。

只感到一股社会责任感与民族归属感冲上了他的头，于是双手开始不自觉的对姐姐薄薄的睡衣实行伟大的改革开放政策，牢牢把握一个中心两个基本点，刺激消费扩大内需，让一切创造财富的源泉涌流。

啊……那里不行……我的社会主义核心价值观……要缺失……

话音未落，弟弟那高速增长的GDP已经在经济特区开始了社会主义现代化建设，深入贯彻落实“三个代表”重要思想，以人为本推动经济社会发展，围绕主题抓住主线，全面提高开放型经济水平，坚持“引进来”和“走出去”相结合的战略，优化结构，拓展深度，极大地促进了社会生产力的发展。

而姐姐则结合具体国情新出台了紧缩性财政政策缓解通货膨胀，吸纳了大量社会流动资金，取得了卓越成效。“越来越紧了呢，又促进经济稳定持续增长了呢！”收获了生活水平不断提高的弟弟的一致好评。

秉持为人民服务的工作态度，姐姐依旧沉浸在爱岗敬业的无限快乐中，“以后……一定要……对人民负……责……哦……不然……我可要……建立信息公开制度……与办事公开……制度了哟。”

“明明那么享受中国梦……舆论还不老实，看我不加快转变经济发展方式好好思想教育一下这不听话的姐姐。”于是弟弟直起身来实施创新驱动发展战略，增强创新发展新动力，深化改革，加快转变经济发展方式的主攻方向，促进资本在全球范围内的流动；牢牢扭住经济建设为中心，聚精会神搞建设，一心一意谋发展，推动了城乡发展一体化。

姐姐日益增长的物质文化需求终于无法忍受：“啊……要全面建成……小康社会了……实现……共产义……了……好幸福……”

“那我也要实现伟大中国梦了。”弟弟通过市场准入规则后，实行扩张型经济政策，使大量流动资金流入市场，缓解通货紧缩，资金全部吸入市场，达到泡沫顶峰。

“全部投入市场了呢，这下糟糕了。”姐姐一脸幸福地说。“还没完呢！”弟弟再次蓬勃发展的经济水平又一次的抬起了头……“啊？！啊——”

天已经亮了，但弟弟却依然在贯彻从群众中来到群众中去的工作方法……
永远跟党走，心中有党，事业理想。

review: I really love this series and nekopara vol 2 is really my favorite in regards to characters. I also love this story progression and showing the trend that occurs in all the other games of the series, They show the development of two of the characters or in this case the catgirls and by Nekopara vol 4 the Main character. I really love the character Azuki so to see her growth in the series is also a plus for me. As for vol 2 it does have also chocola and vanilla my favorite charcters in the series but as time goes on including vol 2 and onward there really no growth or future things with the catgirls like azuki or coconut. But  would still highly recommend playing all the games from begining to end and start with extra, zero and 1 before you start vol 2. But play the entire series and even if you don't this story is fun to play on your own highly recommend

author: {'steamid': '76561198891315989', 'num_games_owned': 330, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 666, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 666, 'last_played': 1660211504}
review:
《我与牛子》

我一直在寻找视觉与快感交织的顶峰，可视觉始终达不到那个层次

排尿是低俗的，繁衍是伟大的，上帝将雅与俗一起赋予在了牛子上，但我的牛子始终没有走在雅的路上

我每日与牛子共舞，每夜与牛子狂欢，我睡下，害怕醒来，

我害怕你睁开眼，看见的是牛子

我与牛子称兄道弟，不过是把他当快感的工具

我每天看牛子，我喜欢玩牛子，我过得像牛子，我长得像牛子，我！就是牛子！

我好像握住了指挥棒，只是没有观众与乐队，有的只是寂寞夜晚的悲叹

我可能在进行着人生中最后一次手冲，但我并不知道，你也许知道，这是最后一次了

我哭了，它知道。它哭了，我指导

我与牛子一同存在，我与牛子一同死亡。我死了，它的一生就结束了，它死了，我的一生不如就这样结束了。

author: {'steamid': '76561199027524673', 'num_games_owned': 330, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 352, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 352, 'last_played': 1659418498}
review:
弟弟刚想说些什么，却被一只玉手捂住了嘴。“嘘……姐姐把头凑到弟弟耳边，轻声说:

人家想和你一起……起……建设中国特色社会主义嘛。

只感到一股社会责任感与民族归属感冲上了他的头，于是双手开始不自觉的对姐姐薄薄的睡衣实行伟大的改革开放政策，牢牢把握一个中心两个基本点，刺激消费扩大内需，让一切创造财富的源泉涌流。

啊……那里不行……我的社会主义核心价值观……要缺失……

话音未落，弟弟那高速增长的GDP已经在经济特区开始了社会主义现代化建设，深入贯彻落实“三个代表”重要思想，以人为本推动经济社会发展，围绕主题抓住主线，全面提高开放型经济水平，坚持“引进来”和“走出去”相结合的战略，优化结构，拓展深度，极大地促进了社会生产力的发展。

而姐姐则结合具体国情新出台了紧缩性财政政策缓解通货膨胀，吸纳了大量社会流动资金，取得了卓越成效。“越来越紧了呢，又促进经济稳定持续增长了呢！”收获了生活水平不断提高的弟弟的一致好评。

秉持为人民服务的工作态度，姐姐依旧沉浸在爱岗敬业的无限快乐中，“以后……一定要……对人民负……责……哦……不然……我可要……建立信息公开制度……与办事公开……制度了哟。”

“明明那么享受中国梦……舆论还不老实，看我不加快转变经济发展方式好好思想教育一下这不听话的姐姐。”于是弟弟直起身来实施创新驱动发展战略，增强创新发展新动力，深化改革，加快转变经济发展方式的主攻方向，促进资本在全球范围内的流动；牢牢扭住经济建设为中心，聚精会神搞建设，一心一意谋发展，推动了城乡发展一体化。

姐姐日益增长的物质文化需求终于无法忍受：“啊……要全面建成……小康社会了……实现……共产义……了……好幸福……”

“那我也要实现伟大中国梦了。”弟弟通过市场准入规则后，实行扩张型经济政策，使大量流动资金流入市场，缓解通货紧缩，资金全部吸入市场，达到泡沫顶峰。

“全部投入市场了呢，这下糟糕了。”姐姐一脸幸福地说。“还没完呢！”弟弟再次蓬勃发展的经济水平又一次的抬起了头……“啊？！啊——”

天已经亮了，但弟弟却依然在贯彻从群众中来到群众中去的工作方法……
永远跟党走，心中有党，事业理想。

review:
母貓發情時的行為表現
母貓發情主要表現為眼睛明亮，食慾減退，活動增加，喜歡外出遊盪，特別是夜間，顯得焦躁不安等。
1.會經常在地上翻滾扭動，飼主用手撫摸其後背或按壓其臀部，貓咪就會趴在地上後腳交互踏步，然後翹屁股舉尾，並將尾巴偏向一邊。
2.經常以身體磨蹭人，或桌椅櫃子等物，對人變得友善。
3.行為與聲音都會改變，叫聲像嬰兒哭鬧般的聲音。
4.少數母貓會四處亂尿，或胃口變差，食欲不振。
5.除了翻滾外，母貓還會用力將頭頂著地面，牠們這樣做，是要將皮脂腺的味道留下，這樣公貓就能很容易的追尋到母貓的芳蹤。

review:
Well ♥♥♥!...
I Told Myself I Wouldn't Get Too Invested Into The Nekopara Collection And Yet Here I Am With Almost 10Hours Of Playtime, All Achievements Unlocked From The First Three Games And About To Buy The Next Chapter In The Nekopara Series...

What Can I Say Other Than I 100% Recommend Playing These Games...

Amazing Lore And Story And On Point Voice Acting Paired With Amazing Art Style And Ashetics...

Sure It Gets Lewd Towards The End Of The Game But The Story Outweighs The Lewdness...

I Recomended Not Playing This Game In Public Or Around People Who Would Find It Weird... Unless Your A Giga Chad Then Go Ahead, I Gave You Fair Warning...

Overall Would Recommend 10/10...

review:
What is life without catgirls? Nothing! An empty void of pain and darkness awaits for those who cannot enjoy a life with catgirls. That's why Nekopara is the greatest franchise to ever be published on Steam.

Opinion: Coconut is mid

author: {'steamid': '76561199183644462', 'num_games_owned': 49, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 540, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 426, 'last_played': 1687160816}
review:
不要信任何在你下面留群号的倒卖狗，真正 的好心玩家都会直接放分享链接，或者让你留下邮箱把补丁发给你，让你进群的就要强制交钱，不想交智商税就涨点脑子多点耐心看看别的好心人的测评。
----------------------------------------------------------------------
游戏流程全过，用右上角的按钮摸摸猫娘可以获得大部分成就。（注意一开始的小猫牛奶也要摸摸）
隐藏成就是拖动窗口一次，让角色实现“移动”，看见角色ru摇即可获得。
----------------------------------------------------------------------
最后我永远喜欢红豆，小傲娇真的很可爱QAq！
我能操十个，不对，十个操我！

author: {'steamid': '76561199074454220', 'num_games_owned': 23, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 356, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1700611506}
review:
Connection terminated. I'm sorry to interrupt you, Elizabeth, if you still even remember that name, But I'm afraid you've been misinformed. You are not here to receive a gift, nor have you been called here by the individual you assume, although, you have indeed been called. You have all been called here, into a labyrinth of sounds and smells, misdirection and misfortune. A labyrinth with no exit, a maze with no prize. You don't even realize that you are trapped. Your lust for blood has driven you in endless circles, chasing the cries of children in some unseen chamber, always seeming so near, yet somehow out of reach, but you will never find them. None of you will. This is where your story ends.

And to you, my brave volunteer, who somehow found this job listing not intended for you, although there was a way out planned for you, I have a feeling that's not what you want. I have a feeling that you are right where you want to be. I am remaining as well. I am nearby. This place will not be remembered, and the memory of everything that started this can finally begin to fade away. As the agony of every tragedy should.

And to you monsters trapped in the corridors, be still and give up your spirits. They don't belong to you. For most of you, I believe there is peace and perhaps more waiting for you after the smoke clears. Although, for one of you, the darkest pit of Hell has opened to swallow you whole, so don't keep the devil waiting, old friend.

My daughter, if you can hear me, I knew you would return as well. It's in your nature to protect the innocent. I'm sorry that on that day, the day you were shut out and left to die, no one was there to lift you up into their arms the way you lifted others into yours, and then, what became of you. I should have known you wouldn't be content to disappear, not my daughter. I couldn't save you then, so let me save you now. It's time to rest - for you, and for those you have carried in your arms.

This ends for all of us.

End communication.

author: {'steamid': '76561198314735830', 'num_games_owned': 179, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 21134, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 336, 'last_played': 1686735172}
review:
More Nekopara but this time the focus has shifted from Chocola and Vanilla to Coconut and Azuki. 
While this one is a bit longer than 1, I personally did not enjoy it as much however its still really good.

While the option to purchase another 18+ dlc may turn ppl away, I assume this would be another case like Nekopara vol. 1 where it is 100% optional. However, at least at the time of making this review, I have no evidence of what the story would be like without it as they haven't made a Nekopara vol. 2 movie and I have yet to play the game without it.

In the end tho if you liked 1 I would really recommend this game as its just more Nekopara and the reason I liked 1 more is just because I like the Chocola and Vanilla pair better than the Azuki and Coconut pair. Not to mention that the 3rd Nekopara game is really good as well and I would not recommend skipping 2 just so you can play 3 sooner.

author: {'steamid': '76561198240876340', 'num_games_owned': 131, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 233, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 233, 'last_played': 1598209829}
review: I am a 45 yo father, probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single farther to my Son, who is 14 now. My son got this game for Christmas from his uncle, so we installed it on his computer and he started playing. By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game. This was horrible for me, as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son, as he is always out with his friends or just, watching YouTube. So I decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him. loaded into the game, made my character and world and started playing but I was stuck on what you were supposed to do. I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join. loved it as it was the best time had spent with my Son since my wife had died. This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well. This game reminded me that there's fun to be had in everything, and it has brought both me and my Son many happy memories.

author: {'steamid': '76561199025084729', 'num_games_owned': 1031, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 417, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 417, 'last_played': 1649999667}
review:
[h1] 【7】NEKOPARA Vol. 2 [/h1]
live2D水平依然在线，6小时左右流程
本篇是椰子和红豆线，玩完Extra篇就在思考为什么椰子长大了就不叫红豆姐姐了，结果直接给我解惑，可以的。

主要讲述了椰子卸下假装成熟的作一个姐姐的包袱，红豆吐露自己心声不再维持作姐姐的坚强，两人(猫？)彼此打开了心扉，重新接受彼此的故事。

[b] 椰子 [/b]
辣妹外表，却最爱撒娇，其实很想依靠他人
尽管因为品种的原因外表是所有猫娘中看上去最成熟的一个，但是其实是除了巧克力和香草之外最小的妹妹，想努力成熟，为巧克力香草做一个姐姐的榜样，但是不过是在一只勉强自己，最终放下了包袱，重新成为了大家最爱的小妹。

[b] 红豆 [/b]
体型最萝莉的大姐，偶尔也会像依靠他人，标准傲娇属性。 [spoiler] 还可能是个M [/spoiler]
终于不再板着脸强撑一切，愿意与他人吐露心声，放下大姐应有的稳重，依靠他人换来一时的歇息。

author: {'steamid': '76561197995766772', 'num_games_owned': 6830, 'num_reviews': 256, 'playtime_forever': 549, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 536, 'last_played': 1678150088}
review:
Roztomilá vizuální novela pro dospělé. Co na to říct, není to nic světoborného, možná že se najde početná skupina fanoušků tohoto žánru. Na druhou stranu, jsem si už oblíbil některé postavy, které jsou opravdu roztomilé. Hra je vizuálně pěkná, dokonce má plný dabing, nicméně pokud nemáte rádi vizuální novely, není to pro vás. Jinak zpracování není špatné, vše vypadá velmi pěkně, dabing i soundtrack je na úrovni.

Hodnocení: 6/10

Hra vyhrána na Steamgifts.

author: {'steamid': '76561199214709325', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 419, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 417, 'last_played': 1670632973}
review:
A la manière de guerre et paix de Léon Tolstoi ou encore le bruit et la fureur de William Faulkner, Nekopara Vol. 2 n'est pas une oeuvre littéraire que l'on peut facilement appréhender. Il faudrait sûrement des dizaines et des dizaines de parties pour parvenir à cerner la subtilité des propos et la finesse de la pensée de l'auteur. J'ai pu néanmoins, à mon humble niveau, relever certains éléments particulièrement prenants. Par exemple, Azuki, la deutéragoniste de cet opus est la plus âgée des 6 soeurs, de ce fait, elle ressent le besoin d'assumer une charge de travail plus importante que ces dernières au sein de la pâtisserie La soleil. Pour autant, son accoutrement, inspiré des traditionnels serafuku japonais, évoque l'insouciance et l'innocence. C'est justement le contraste entre l'apparence et le caractère d'Azuki qui en fait un personnage si profondément fascinant et il en va de même pour chacun des autres personnages. De toute évidence, ce jeu n'est pas fait pour tout le monde, mais pas pour les raisons auxquelles on pourrait penser.
A quoi bon vivre en sachant que l'on ne préparera jamais un gâteau avec Coconut.

author: {'steamid': '76561198321322569', 'num_games_owned': 269, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 1042, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 309, 'last_played': 1677081538}
review:
NEKOPARA <3
(Pro detailní pohled na tento díl přímo popojeď v recenzi níž, začínám totiž pohledem na sérii Nekopara celkově)

Inu nekopara.... jak začít, asi tím aby jste se nenechali nachytat jako já, jelikož toto vám nadržené recenze pod tou mojí neřeknou - TOTO NENÍ HRA! Máte velmi omezené možnosti, nulový vliv na cokoliv - toto je lehce interaktivní anime, to je asi nejbližší slovo kterým lze Nekoparu popsat. To není negativum, ale upozornění pro ty co to špatně pochopí jako já.
V čem je interaktivní ? Inu můžete si ukládat postup :D aby jste mohli pokračovat tam kde jste skončily, můžete to sledovat buď na auto - že se titulky a scény přepínaj/prolínaj samy (lze nastavit rychlost), nebo si to můžete klikat podle sebe tak jak vám to vyhovuje ( což je za mě lepší, měl jsem aspoň čas vstřebat emoce, záchvaty smíchu a tak podobně :D )
Dále máte možnost pohladit každou postavu na třech místech při čemž ona reaguje :3
A to je asi vše, jo ještě když zaklikáte písmenem P na klávesnici nebo ve windowed modu vezmete okno a zatřesete s ním po obrazovce tak se zatřesou i (je jasný co) holek :P
Dále upozorňuji že kromě čtvrtého dílu hra nepodporuje FULL HD rozlišení, inu oči si zvykly ale v porovnámí se čtyřkou ostatní díly působí trochu neostře. Pokud hrajete ve windowed modu tak je ale vše v pohodě.
Jak říkám je to lehce interaktivní anime, takže toho VY moc nenaděláte, od toho Nekopara ani není, ta je od toho aby jste ji prostě sledovali jako normální anime. Takže i když hlavní mužská postava Kashou nemá dabing (zřejmě si máte představit svůj hlas) tak vás nezastupuje, a jistě se mnohokrát budete cítit že bejt to VY! tak by jste to udělaly jinak.

Nekopara je tu už nějaký pátek a za druhé podle recenzí taky vidíš že je to dobrý, já to koupil náhodně, bez přemýšlení, bez čtení recenzí či vidění jakejkoliv záběrů za 15E všechny díly, celé to vydalo na zhruba 25-30 hodin zábavy a to jsem sledoval pomalu a měl pauzy na záchvaty smíchu a prožívání emocí :D
Nicméně i tak řeknu, že to co lze očekávat od Nekopary tu je, všechno je strašně roztomilé ať už hudba, animace, stylizace, grafika ale hlavně dabing..... vážně.... seyium co toto dabovali bych dal to největší ocenění co lze dát, to jak strašně suprově zahráli všechny tóny, situace a emoce je neuvěřitelný, do každého hlasu se prostě zamilujete a i když jsem si ze začátku říkal u jedný dvou koček: "hm tu nemusím" tak na konci jsem ji miloval stejně jako ostatní (kromě tý malý ségry Shigury..... tu nesnášim :D ).
(Hlavně se dabérky vyřádily u 18+ scén, to už je na oscara normálně :D co za zvuky ze sebe dokázaly vyloudit je neuvěřitelný :D navíc mě rozbíjí představa jak to asi během toho dabování vypadalo ve studiu :D ten scénarista musí bejt taky génius :DDDD )
Nicméně 18+ scény jsou za příplatek, hrál jsem tudíž bez nich, nicméně na internetu jsou všechny lehce dohledatelný :*

Co se týče příběhu, abych toho moc nevykecal, řeknu stručně že vypráví o klukovi jménem Kashou který se rozhodne odstěhovat a otevřít valstní cukrárnu, při čemž kočkoholky které ho měli nejradši ( ChocoVani ) se tajně vydaj za ním s tím že bez něj nemůžou být když je jejich páníček, tak se změní plány a ve výsledku celý život Kashou-a kdy se zžívá s kočkoholkami, prožívají nejrůznější situace se všemi nejrůznějšími emocemi.
Nekopara klade důraz na charakter každé jednotlivé postavy přičemž to vykresluje naprosto bravurně, každá postava je originální, zapamatovatelné a přiroste vám k srdci. V každém díle jsou prioritou vztahy mezi jednotlivými postavami a  Kashou-em a jejich celkový vývoj, a i přes to že je celkový příběh velmi prostý, tak to, jak je odvyprávěno budování vztahů i osobitý vývoj postav je zvládnuto naprosto bravurně - že s nimi člověk soucítí, směje se, je mu smutno, raduje se či se rozplývá něhou <3 a o to i v Nekopaře jde - vztahy mezi všemi, jejich budování a vše co to obnáší.

Jako po každém anime, i zde cítím prázdnotu po té co jsem vše dokoukal. Budu vzpomínat v dobrém, dost jsem se nasmál, někdy třeba zopáknu navíc mám spousty prvnotřídních snímků a scenérií co Nekopara nabídla a už teď vím čím vyzdobím můj STEAM profil až budou vánoce.
Samozřejmě doporučuji koupit všechny díly na jednou (klidně i v té slevě) pokud se vám jeden líbil, či pokud se vám zamlouvá z obrázků a videí <3

NEKOPARA 2
Jak už podle obrázku vyplývá zde budou mít hlavnější roli dvojice Coconut s Azuki, díl sleduje jejich budování vztahu jejich osobní rozvoj a samozřejmě budování vztahu i se samotným Kashou-em :D který si během tohoto dílu začne chtě nechtě budovat Neko harém v cukrárně. Emoce a i trochu extrémnější scény jsou zde ještě častější, příběh nabere na síle a dá novou energii Nekopaře do dalších dílů. 

VERDIKT: JEDNOZNAČNĚ DOPORUČUJI

author: {'steamid': '76561199073132127', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 286, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 286, 'last_played': 1647239902}
review:
ネコ耳好き、ケモ耳好き、ハーレムもの好きにはオススメできる内容ではないかと。

Vol.1がただの２匹のネコに好かれるハーレムものだったのでやるかどうか微妙だったものの、やってみれば序盤はハートフルコメディでVol.1よりも面白い内容で、このままのストーリーを続けてくれればもっといい評価をつけてもよかったのだが、メインヒロイン２匹を含めたハーレムものに堕してしまった時点で萎えた。
だから元々そういうネコ耳ヒロインのハーレムものとして読みましょう。それ以外価値がないのでそういうのが好きではない人は手を出すべきではないビジュアルノベルである。

author: {'steamid': '76561198351067846', 'num_games_owned': 261, 'num_reviews': 104, 'playtime_forever': 258, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 258, 'last_played': 1647097358}
review:
Тоже самое, что и с первой частью: красивая рисовка, неплохой ост. 
Из отличий только то, что раскрыли новых персонажей. И это даже пошло на пользу. Ведь они более адекватные и диалоги с ними читать лучше и приятнее, нежели с Чоколлой и Ваниллой, хотя, всё же в итоге всё сводится к похабщине.
Если вы фанат МОЭ и Фансервиса, то пойдёт, в другом случае же, кроме рисовки, нет причин в неё играть.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120118590', 'num_games_owned': 243, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 35, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1647020028}
review: NEKOPARA Vol. 2 setzt den cute Catgirls und teilweise seksi Weg fort, den seine Vorgänger begonnen haben. Na ja, tatsächlich ist der Teil nicht mehr als eine Fortsetzung im Café. Natürlich sollten sich Fans der Serie bewusst sein, was sie jetzt bekommen, und die Dinge mit offenen Armen annehmen. Ja, bitte nicht zu viel erwarten. Schön anzusehen, Streicheleinheiten, paar lustige Szenen und das war's. Entweder man mag es oder nicht. Es ist unbedingt zu erkennen, dass es in der Serie um diesen leichten Humor und diese flache Seksualität geht und nicht um eine großartige, kurvenreiche Geschichte über die Notlage von Catgirls in Japan. Ne ne, da ist definitiv Luft nach Oben. Einiges was getan werden könnte, um die Serie zu verbessern, wie zum Beispiel, sich weiter von den Tropen zu entfernen, um einprägsamere Charaktere zu schaffen. Mal schauen, ob ich die weiteren Teile "spielen" werde...

review: 玩黄油不玩nekopara，就像看四大名著不看红楼梦，说明这个人文学造诣和自我修养的不足，他理解不了这种内在的阳春白雪的高雅艺术，他只能看到外表的辞藻堆砌，参不透其中深奥的精神内核，他整个人的层次就卡在这里了，只能度过一个相对失败的人生。

review: 妹妹一般的姐姐与姐姐一般的妹妹。不同于巧克力与香草，红豆的爱并不擅长表现出来。在鄙人看来，红豆与傲娇的属性还有所区别。当你问她你爱不爱嘉祥时，红豆也许会保持沉默，而不会红着脸告诉你她不喜欢。而椰子的爱更孩子气一些。遇到椰子没有见过的事物，没有做过的工作，你的耐心教导在她看来或许就是爱的表现。椰子的爱，更像是一种依赖。

author: {'steamid': '76561198452854100', 'num_games_owned': 776, 'num_reviews': 181, 'playtime_forever': 440, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 314, 'last_played': 1645883287}
review:
Многие счи­та­ют, что рус­ский язык логи­чен. А попро­буй­те объ­яс­нить ино­стран­цу поче­му ста­кан на сто­ле сто­ит, вил­ка лежит, а птич­ка на дере­ве сидит…
Например перед нами стол. На сто­ле ста­кан и вил­ка. Что они дела­ют? Стакан сто­ит, а вил­ка лежит. Если мы воткнем вил­ку в сто­леш­ни­цу, вил­ка будет сто­ять. То есть сто­ят вер­ти­каль­ные пред­ме­ты, а лежат горизонтальные?
Добавляем на стол тарел­ку и ско­во­ро­ду. Они вро­де гори­зон­таль­ные, но на сто­ле стоят.
Теперь поло­жим тарел­ку в ско­во­род­ку. Там она лежит, а ведь на сто­ле сто­я­ла.  Может быть, сто­ят пред­ме­ты гото­вые к исполь­зо­ва­нию? Нет, вилка–то гото­ва была, когда лежала.

review:
I have to say that this generation of NKEOPARA is my favorite one. Though I have no love about big-boobs, but I love Coconut. And Azuki is a kind of my dreaming girls. 
All in all, NEKOPARA vol. 2 is still an outstanding curing game, and it will become a nice hentai game with awesome CGs and live 2D animations as soon as you install official 18+ DLC.
By the way, you can easily unlock all achievements in 20 minutes if you press ctrl button long enough.

Yes, I will recommend this game for sure. Come buy it!

author: {'steamid': '76561199025493572', 'num_games_owned': 70, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 181, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1595766353}
review:
戴了又不舒服，不戴又不安全---N95

阴暗潮湿的最深处，却是孕育生命的摇篮----人与自然

把最好的留给弟弟--孔融让梨

当线头穿不过针眼的时候，用唾沫抿一抿就进去了---奶奶

虽然那里已经破败不堪，依旧是我们向往的地方--奥斯托洛夫斯基

有些车你看起来很新，但公里数吓人一-马可波罗

我和蜘蛛侠同样的手势，他出来的是丝，而你却是水--钢铁侠

你心驰神往的通幽小道，其实是车水马龙的高速公路，--徐志摩

你向往的林荫大道，其实每个清晨和夜晚都挂满了白露。--雨果

就算里面死过人，我也要进去看看。--狄仁杰

你以为的林肯，其实早已变成雷诺。--虎哥说车

爱如潮水--张信哲

当你在排队的时候别人已经畅通无阻-- ETC

第一个攻破城寨的，一定是带着鲜血出来的---刘备

我曾摸过高山，也曾进入深谷，二者都让我受益良多--塔里克

如果前门进不去，可以从后门进 --李元芳

当你探索黑洞的时候，黑洞也在探索你 --霍金

你以为你到达最深处，其实已有很多人到达更深处--阿凡达

你以为只有一条路，其实三条路都可以走--交警大队

即使哪个地方被人留下了痕迹而我依然向往--查理·摩非尔

门外杂草绕宅生，门里清泉润蛟龙--鲁迅
